description.value: Your steadfast faith in Grandmother Rat yields more rewards. You gain divine decree as a 7th-rank divine innate spell once per day. Additionally, once per month, whenever you would die, your body instead transforms into a swarm of dispersing rats. After [[/gmr 1d6 #days]]{1d6 days}, these rats gather in a safe space of the GM's choosing (a site dedicated to Lao Shu Po, if possible) and reform your body. You're returned to life at your maximum Hit Points.
